data.transfer

Class DataTransfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.transfer.DataTransfer

  • public class DataTransfer
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps EDTFTPJ library with simple FTP operations method, with synchronous and asynchronous options.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

    • Field Summary

      • getFileWithCompletion

        public void getFileWithCompletion(java.lang.String remoteFileName,
                                  java.lang.String localFileName,
                                  CompletionCallable completion)
        Downloads a remote file asynchronously. Must have navigated to the directory containing the file first using a "goToDirectory..." method.
        Parameters:
        remoteFileName - The remote file name to download
        localFileName - The local file name to which file will be written
        completion - Completion to call when finished

        directory - Name of the directory.
        Returns:

      • getFilesList

        public FileListingResult getFilesList(java.lang.String directoryName)
        Retrieves a list of files and basic metadatas for all files in a directory. Must first have navigated to the path containing the directory using one of the "goToDirectory.." method.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - Name of the directory
        Returns:
        Result of the file listing attempt

      • getFilesList

        public FileListingResult getFilesList(java.lang.String directoryName,
                                      java.lang.String childName)
        Retrieves a list of files and basic metadatas for all files in a directory. Must first have navigated to the path containing the directory using one of the "goToDirectory.." method.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - Name of the base directory path
        childName - Name of the directory to list
        Returns:
        Result of the file listing attempt

      • transferFile

        public CompletionResult transferFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Uploads local file. Must first have navigated to the path containing the directory using one of the "goToDirectory.." method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the remote file, and name of the local file
        Returns:
        Result of the upload

      • transferFile

        public CompletionResult transferFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                     java.lang.String remoteName)
        Uploads remote file. Must first have navigated to the path containing the directory using one of the "goToDirectory.." method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Local path of the file to upload
        remoteName - Remote file name to save
        Returns:
        Result of the upload

        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the remote file, and name of the local file
        Returns:
        Result of the download

      • getFile

                                java.lang.String localFilePath)
        Downloads remote file. Must first have navigated to the path containing the directory using one of the "goToDirectory.." method.
        Parameters:
        remoteFileName - Name of the remote file to download
        localFilePath - Path of the local file to which downloaded file will be saved
        Returns:
        Result of the download

      • ftpFileListToFilesNameAndSize

        Transforms a list of FTPFile metadata object into a simple Map where keys are file names, and values are file sizes in bytes.
        Parameters:
        ftpList - List of FTPFile objects
        Returns:
        Map of file names and sizes

      • getLocalFileSize

        public static long getLocalFileSize(java.lang.String fileName,
                                    java.lang.String directory)
        Determine size in bytes of a local file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to check
        directory - Directory that contains the file to check
        Returns:
        Size of the file, or 0 if there was a problem
